content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Everything from the food to the service is next level! Chef Daniel's takes on modern Asian cuisine feel fresh and new, like he took the plates I grew up with and turned it into fine dining. I highly recommend the stuffed chicken legs, scallops, and strip tenderloin. Hands down my new favorite place to eat!
